description: Homelab power monitoring â€” per-host power draw, CPU, memory, and network

panels.title: Total Power Now
panels.description: Sum of all host power readings in the last 2 minutes

targets.query:
from(bucket: "powermon")
  |> range(start: -2m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "power" and r._field == "watts" and r.domain == "total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host !~ /^(TFLEMING-MAY25)$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^(${host_filter:regex})$/)
  |> last()
  |> group()
  |> sum()

panels.title: Active Hosts
panels.description: Number of hosts reporting in the last 2 minutes

targets.query:
from(bucket: "powermon")
  |> range(start: -2m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "power" and r._field == "watts" and r.domain == "total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host !~ /^(TFLEMING-MAY25)$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^(${host_filter:regex})$/)
  |> last()
  |> group()
  |> count()

panels.title: Peak Power (1h)
panels.description: Highest total power reading in the last hour

targets.query:
from(bucket: "powermon")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "power" and r._field == "watts" and r.domain == "total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host !~ /^(TFLEMING-MAY25)$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^(${host_filter:regex})$/)
  |> group()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> max()

panels.title: Avg Power (1h)
panels.description: Average total power over the last hour

targets.query:
from(bucket: "powermon")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "power" and r._field == "watts" and r.domain == "total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host !~ /^(TFLEMING-MAY25)$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^(${host_filter:regex})$/)
  |> group()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> mean()

panels.title: Power per Host
panels.description: Total power draw over time, one line per reporting host

targets.query:
others = from(bucket: "powermon")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "power" and r._field == "watts" and r.domain == "total" and r.host != "TFLEMING-MAY25" and r.host != "tfleming-may25-ups")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^(${host_filter:regex})$/)
  |> group(columns: ["host"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
desktop = from(bucket: "powermon")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "power" and r._field == "watts" and r.domain == "total" and r.host == "TFLEMING-MAY25")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^(${host_filter:regex})$/)
  |> group(columns: ["host"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
deskw = from(bucket: "powermon")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "power" and r._field == "watts" and r.domain == "total" and r.host == "TFLEMING-MAY25")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^(${host_filter:regex})$/)
  |> group()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "dw"})
upsw = from(bucket: "powermon")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "power" and r._field == "watts" and r.domain == "total" and r.host == "tfleming-may25-ups")
  |> group()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "uw"})
upsOverhead = join(tables: {d: deskw, u: upsw}, on: ["_time"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_time: r._time, _value: if r.uw - r.dw > 0.0 then r.uw - r.dw else 0.0, host: "tfleming-may25-ups"}))
  |> group(columns: ["host"])
union(tables: [others, desktop, upsOverhead])
  |> yield(name: "mean")

panels.title: Current Power by Host
panels.description: Latest total power draw per host. All agent types shown (RAPL, WMI, powermetrics, TDP estimate, Shelly).

targets.query:
desktopW = (from(bucket: "powermon")
  |> range(start: -2m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "power" and r._field == "watts" and r.domain == "total" and r.host == "TFLEMING-MAY25")
  |> group()
  |> last()
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0))._value
nonUps = from(bucket: "powermon")
  |> range(start: -2m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "power" and r._field == "watts" and r.domain == "total" and r.host != "tfleming-may25-ups")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^(${host_filter:regex})$/)
  |> group(columns: ["host", "domain"])
  |> last()
upsRow = from(bucket: "powermon")
  |> range(start: -2m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "power" and r._field == "watts" and r.domain == "total" and r.host == "tfleming-may25-ups")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^(${host_filter:regex})$/)
  |> group(columns: ["host", "domain"])
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: if r._value - desktopW > 0.0 then r._value - desktopW else 0.0}))
union(tables: [nonUps, upsRow])
  |> group()
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["host"], columnKey: ["domain"], valueColumn: "_value")

panels.title: Current Power by Host
panels.description: Latest power and total energy consumed per host for the selected time range

targets.query:
desktopW = (from(bucket: "powermon")
  |> range(start: -2m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "power" and r._field == "watts" and r.domain == "total" and r.host == "TFLEMING-MAY25")
  |> group()
  |> last()
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0))._value
nonUps = from(bucket: "powermon")
  |> range(start: -2m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "power" and r._field == "watts" and r.domain == "total" and r.host != "tfleming-may25-ups")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^(${host_filter:regex})$/)
  |> group(columns: ["host"])
  |> last()
  |> group()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({Host: r.host, "Current (W)": r._value}))
upsRow = from(bucket: "powermon")
  |> range(start: -2m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "power" and r._field == "watts" and r.domain == "total" and r.host == "tfleming-may25-ups")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^(${host_filter:regex})$/)
  |> group(columns: ["host"])
  |> last()
  |> group()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({Host: r.host, "Current (W)": if r._value - desktopW > 0.0 then r._value - desktopW else 0.0}))
union(tables: [nonUps, upsRow])

desktopE = (from(bucket: "powermon")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "power" and r._field == "watts" and r.domain == "total" and r.host == "TFLEMING-MAY25")
  |> group(columns: ["host", "_start", "_stop"])
  |> integral(unit: 1h)
  |> group()
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0))._value
nonUps = from(bucket: "powermon")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "power" and r._field == "watts" and r.domain == "total" and r.host != "tfleming-may25-ups")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^(${host_filter:regex})$/)
  |> group(columns: ["host", "_start", "_stop"])
  |> integral(unit: 1h)
  |> group()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({Host: r.host, "Energy (Wh)": r._value}))
upsRow = from(bucket: "powermon")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "power" and r._field == "watts" and r.domain == "total" and r.host == "tfleming-may25-ups")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^(${host_filter:regex})$/)
  |> group(columns: ["host", "_start", "_stop"])
  |> integral(unit: 1h)
  |> group()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({Host: r.host, "Energy (Wh)": if r._value - desktopE > 0.0 then r._value - desktopE else 0.0}))
union(tables: [nonUps, upsRow])

from(bucket: "powermon")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "cpu" and r._field == "usage_idle" and r.cpu == "cpu-total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^(${host_filter:regex})$/)
  |> group(columns: ["host"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: 100.0 - r._value}))
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "powermon")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mem" and r._field == "used_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^(${host_filter:regex})$/)
  |> group(columns: ["host"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "powermon")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "net" and (r._field == "bytes_recv" or r._field == "bytes_sent") and r.interface != "lo")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^(${host_filter:regex})$/)
  |> group(columns: ["host", "interface", "_field"])
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> group(columns: ["host", "_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

panels.title: Estimated Energy â€” Selected Period
panels.description: Total energy consumed across all hosts for the selected dashboard time range. Calculated by integrating power (watts) over time. Accuracy depends on data collection interval (10s).

targets.query:
from(bucket: "powermon")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "power" and r._field == "watts" and r.domain == "total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host !~ /^(TFLEMING-MAY25)$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^(${host_filter:regex})$/)
  |> group(columns: ["host", "_start", "_stop"])
  |> integral(unit: 1h)
  |> group()
  |> sum()

panels.title: Estimated Cost â€” Selected Period
panels.description: Estimated electricity cost for the selected time range across all hosts. Uses the price set in the 'Price ($/kWh)' variable above. Energy (Wh) Ã· 1000 Ã— price per kWh.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "powermon")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "power" and r._field == "watts" and r.domain == "total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host !~ /^(TFLEMING-MAY25)$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^(${host_filter:regex})$/)
  |> group(columns: ["host", "_start", "_stop"])
  |> integral(unit: 1h)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value / 1000.0 * 0.19}))
  |> group()
  |> sum()

panels.title: UPS Status
panels.description: UPS â€” battery level, runtime remaining, power source, and current load. Supports CyberPower (PowerPanel Personal) and APC (apcupsd).

targets.query:
from(bucket: "powermon")
  |> range(start: -3m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "ups" and r._field == "battery_pct")
  |> last()
  |> min()

from(bucket: "powermon")
  |> range(start: -3m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "ups" and r._field == "runtime_min")
  |> last()
  |> min()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: float(v: r._value) * 60.0}))

from(bucket: "powermon")
  |> range(start: -3m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "ups" and r._field == "on_battery")
  |> last()
  |> max()

from(bucket: "powermon")
  |> range(start: -3m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "power" and r._field == "watts" and (r.source == "cyberpower" or r.source == "apcupsd"))
  |> last()
  |> sum()

title: Homelab Power Monitoring
